dmca.title: Alexandria objects to library of leases
dmca.body:
This firm represents Alexandrai Real Estate Equities, Inc. and its affiliated entities (collectively, "Alexandria") with respect to certain intellectual property matters.  Alexandria is the exclusive owner of certain copyrights, including copyrights in and to the protectable material associated with Alexandria's rental agreements, lease forms and purchase agreements (collectively, "Alexandria copyrights").

We have recently learned that Alexandria Copyrights are being posted and distributed on http://www.onecle.com without Alexandria's authorization ("Unauthorized Items").  By this letter we demand that you immediately remove the Unauthorized Items from such website.  If you do not act expeditiously to remove the Unauthorized Items, we will initiate immediate legal action against you, and you may be liable for copyright and trademark infringement, trade secret misappropriation, unfair competition, and/or other remedies at law, including civil and criminal penalties.

We further request written assurance that you will comply with this demand.  Nothing in this letter shall be construed as a waiver or relinquishment of any right or remedy possessed by Alexandria, all of which are expressly reserved.

We anticipate your complete cooperation.

Very truly yours,


[private]

cc:  [private]
     [private], Esq.
